channel.title: Help with server, Please read :)
channel.description: [b]I've been trying to find a server that would have a localclient that i can test, i'm learning how to code and i've check the tutorials in Mopar, somethings are advance for me and when i look at it i go wth does this mean LOL, ive been trying to use 317 source <- Little too old - everything is very simple but it gets annoying when there is a few items and there is no donors shop, no vote point shops, and im used to the ::item instead of ::pickup :/ - i'm not a fast typer but to do a bunch of commands. Can someone please help me find a source w/ localclient - manageable for me to learn how to code.. with recent items? If im asking for too leme know please i wont be offended. THANKS FOR THE HELP! <3 Really appreciate it[/b]

item.title: Help with server, Please read :)
item.dc:creator: @Cookiie Cookiie
item.description:
@Cookiie wrote:

I’ve been trying to find a server that would have a localclient that i can test, i’m learning how to code and i’ve check the tutorials in Mopar, somethings are advance for me and when i look at it i go wth does this mean LOL, ive been trying to use 317 source <- Little too old - everything is very simple but it gets annoying when there is a few items and there is no donors shop, no vote point shops, and im used to the ::item instead of ::pickup - i’m not a fast typer but to do a bunch of commands. Can someone please help me find a source w/ localclient - manageable for me to learn how to code… with recent items? If im asking for too leme know please i wont be offended. THANKS FOR THE HELP! <3 Really appreciate it
